<parameter name="reportDefName" isForPrompting="false" class="java.lang.String"/> <parameter name="whereClause" isForPrompting="false" class="java.lang.String"> <defaultValueExpression ><![CDATA[""]]></defaultValueExpression> </parameter> <parameter name="percentComplete" isForPrompting="false" class="java.lang.String"/> <queryString><![CDATA[select pv.id, i.name as identityName, p.name as policy, p.description as policyDescription, s.violation_summary as rule, s.description as ruleDescription, pv.left_bundles as businessRole1, pv.right_bundles as businessRole2, pv.created as violationDate from spt_identity i, spt_policy p, spt_sodconstraint s, spt_policy_violation pv where pv.identity_id = i.id and pv.constraint_id = s.id and pv.policy_id = p.id $P!{whereClause} order by identityName]]></queryString>
